original_text: That thine eyes may be open unto the supplication of thy servant, and unto the supplication of thy people Israel, to hearken unto them in all that they call for unto thee.
korean_text: 원하건대 주는 눈을 들어 종의 간구함과 주의 백성 이스라엘의 간구함을 보시고 주께 부르짖는 대로 들으시옵소서

sentences.original_text: That thine eyes may be open
unto the supplication of thy servant
and unto the supplication of thy people Israel
in all that they call for unto thee
